featured.text: Two weeks later, black stripes appear on her body, indicating the gender change is complete.

other.text: A lot of ancient civilizations, __(37)__ the Egyptians, Hindus, Greeks, and Mayans, have left writings and __(38)__ which indicate contacts with superior beings “from the stars.”
